tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (PP (IN On) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN road)) (VP (VBG listening) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT some) (JJ groovy) (NNS sounds))) (S (VP (VBG breathing) (NP (NN love)) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT the) (JJ beautiful) (NN sunrise) (NN #gratitude) (NN #love)))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [road/NN case>On/IN det>the/DT acl>[listening/VBG nmod:to>[sounds/NNS case>to/TO det>some/DT amod>groovy/JJ] advcl>[breathing/VBG dobj>love/NN nmod:with>[#love/NN case>with/IN det>the/DT amod>beautiful/JJ compound>sunrise/NN compound>#gratitude/NN]]]]
